text.div:
AllergyIntoleranceSubjectIdentifierSearchParameter

Parameter subject.identifier:token

Searches for AllergyIntolerance by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}

ResourceAllergyIntolerance
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesAllergyIntolerance
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: AllergyIntoleranceSubjectIdentifierSearchParameter
description: Searches for AllergyIntolerance by the patient identifier eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/AllergyIntolerance?subject:Patient.identifier={identifier}
